basics.name: Kurt Kimura
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I have a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences from the University of Hawaii.

work.summary: VR project developed using Unity, built activities on established framework.
highlights: Developed activities for a VR program to help diagnose and treat the development of memory disorders such as Alzheimers.
Organized demos for meetings to showcase development progress, and seek feedback for improvements.
Scanned insurance information to create a digital backup.
Attempted to contact insurance owners who could not be contacted.
Scanned insurance information to create a digital backup, alongside making ease of access during the COVID-19 pandemic.

volunteer.summary: Wrapped food to be put in an imu.
highlights: Wrapped food items, and carried them to be cooked overnight in an imu the evening before Thanksgiving.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
